text: seriously doubt everyone else has their stuff sorted; more like they're good at faking confidence while secretly struggling with their spreadsheets at night.
all planned till 2020 hit us sideways
upgrading skills sounds good but doesn’t guarantee beating inflation either...
salary increases just don’t match these crazy price hikes!
not all savings = sacrifice happiness imo
bigger paycheck shouldn’t kill good old budget wisdom right?

heard once someone splurged on antique office equipment - like typewriters instead of pcs - wild stuff but turns out they became huge hits for themed workshops n events! shows you never can tell with these things 😅
academia's got hidden bias traps all over! super frustrating tbh
fairy tales skip the tough parts
teamwork makes dream work... plus lotsa coffee dates 😅
hard truth - even solid teamwork can’t guarantee forever 😬
some gems just escape time's grasp...still got our forest hideout
seems every cool spot from back then either gets trashed or 're-discovered'—rare when they stay untouched
had our own corner at vine-covered ruins once too
totally get that - feel similar vibes influence me subtly even now despite adapting to new environments constantly.
personal growth outpaces hometown vibes imo
can't shake off those early vibes completely; still shaping our character even as we grow and evolve through different places & experiences
every august we'd meet up at dawn for our own quiet but heartfelt ceremony – still gets me every year
cool story but kite flying contests were real deal back then!
even now can't start eating without silently wishing everyone 'dober tek' 🍽️
